p: Compound 363 was evaluated for its cytototoxicity against different cancer cell lines MOLT-4, A549, MDA-MB-231and MIA PaCa-2 by MTT assay. Interestingly, compound 363 showed considerable cytotoxic potential against the human leukaemia cancer cell line (MOLT-4) with IC 50 value of 20 µmol/L, it was not as active as the positive control flavopiridol (IC 50 value of 0.2 µmol/L) [ 117].
